name: Grupo Axendco SAPI de CV
description: Developer of a digital financial lending platform designed to raise crowdsourced loans for businesses. The company's platform lets anyone invest in businesses using alternative investment products such as person-to-person and SME loans, besides carrying out investments in real estate, factoring, cryptocurrencies, and concerts among others, enabling organizations to raise debt financing via crowdfunding to fund their businesses in a secure manner.
one_liner: Developer of a digital financial lending platform designed to raise crowdsourced loans for businesses. The company's platform lets anyone invest in businesses using alternative investment products such as person-to-person and SME loans, besides carrying out investments in real estate, factoring, cryptocurrencies, and concerts among others, enabling organizations to raise debt financing via crowdfunding to fund their businesses in a secure manner.
